```{r display apoe status from the kuadrc cohort}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
#| eval: !expr params$kuadrc_apoe

apoe <- BRIDGE21::get_database_values(
  ku_apoe1,
  ku_apoe2,
  data = data
)

params$kuadrc_apoe <- !all(apply(apoe, 2, is.na))

if (!is.na(apoe[1]) & !is.na(apoe[2])) {
  apoeCarrierStatus <- sprintf("E%s/E%s", apoe[1], apoe[2])
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto("sections/blood/latex/apoe.tex", type = "input")
  cat("\\textbf{YOUR APOE RESULT}: ", apoeCarrierStatus)
  BRIDGE21::format_quarto(type = "newpage")
}
```
